sentences.sContent: Just calm down, stop gabbling, and tell me what has happened.
sentences.sCn: 冷静一下，说话别太急，告诉我发生了什么事。

synos.tran: 喋喋不休地说；七嘴八嘴地说

remMethod.val: 来自gab(v. 空谈， 瞎扯)； 不要和gobble(v. 贪婪地大口吃)相混

trans.tranOther: to say something so quickly that people cannot hear you clearly or understand you properly
